attributes.additional_details:
Stop wasting money on smart meters until they make
billing more accurate. For the same usage of gas some people pay 10% more than others and smart meters could improve the situation but do not include
the active equipment to do so.

The government should review the specification for smart meters to improve billing accuracy or delay their installation.

We are spending £12b on these meters to achieve no improvement in billing accuracy.

Ray Cope former Director Gas Consumers Council
